title: should return a whole input string when a succeeding (by more than one) string is given
should return a correct substring when a longest succeeding string is placed in the top
should return a correct substring when a longest succeeding string is placed in the bottom
should return a correct substring when the decreasing part is longer than the succeeding part
should return two substrings in the correct order when the input contains two equally longest substrings
should return two characters when a character is repeated twice
should return two substrings when the input contains two equivalent substrings
should return splitted characters when the input is a strictly decreasing string
should return splitted characters when the input is a weekly decreasing string
should return two substrings when the input is a weekly increasing string
